headline.print_headline: Lethargic Barca Slump to Shock Defeat at Granada
headline.main: Lethargic Barca Slump to Shock Defeat at Granada

docs.snippet: Barcelona's nightmare week hit a new low when they followed up their Champions League exit with a shock 1-0 defeat at Granada on Saturday that left their bid for a fifth La Liga title in six years in serious jeopardy....
docs.lead_paragraph: Barcelona's nightmare week hit a new low when they followed up their Champions League exit with a shock 1-0 defeat at Granada on Saturday that left their bid for a fifth La Liga title in six years in serious jeopardy.

headline.print_headline: Alex Cobb Goes 7 Innings, Rays Beat Reds 1-0
headline.main: Alex Cobb Goes 7 Innings, Rays Beat Reds 1-0

docs.snippet: The starter throws seven shutout innings. The defense makes a few big plays. One swing of the bat provides all the offense needed....
docs.lead_paragraph: The starter throws seven shutout innings. The defense makes a few big plays. One swing of the bat provides all the offense needed.

headline.print_headline: Highway Shootings Don't Worry KC-Area Drivers
headline.main: Highway Shootings Don't Worry KC-Area Drivers

docs.snippet: Several shootings have targeted apparently random vehicles along a tangle of interstates in south Kansas City, but it doesn't seem to have rattled area drivers, who say they'll stick with their normal routes....
docs.lead_paragraph: Several shootings have targeted apparently random vehicles along a tangle of interstates in south Kansas City, but it doesn't seem to have rattled area drivers, who say they'll stick with their normal routes.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Senator Warns of Disenchanted Voters in New Hampshire
headline.main: U.S. Senator Warns of Disenchanted Voters in New Hampshire

docs.snippet: Vermont U.S. Senator Bernie Sanders warned that a growing number of Americans were losing faith in the political system at a New Hampshire site that often hosts presidential primary debates. But he said he is "many, many months" away from deciding...
docs.lead_paragraph: Vermont U.S. Senator Bernie Sanders warned that a growing number of Americans were losing faith in the political system at a New Hampshire site that often hosts presidential primary debates. But he said he is "many, many months" away from deciding on a White House run.

headline.print_headline: Cardiff End Difficult Week on a High With Saints Win
headline.main: Cardiff End Difficult Week on a High With Saints Win

docs.snippet: Cardiff City manager Ole Gunnar Solskjaer believes their surprise 1-0 Premier League win at Southampton on Saturday can galvanise his relegation-threatened side after a difficult week for the club....
docs.lead_paragraph: Cardiff City manager Ole Gunnar Solskjaer believes their surprise 1-0 Premier League win at Southampton on Saturday can galvanise his relegation-threatened side after a difficult week for the club.

headline.print_headline: Gunmen Kidnap 100 Pakistani Villagers in Northwest, Government Says
headline.main: Gunmen Kidnap 100 Pakistani Villagers in Northwest, Government Says

docs.snippet: Gunmen stormed a village gathering in northwestern Pakistan on Saturday and kidnapped around 100 men, Pakistani government officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Gunmen stormed a village gathering in northwestern Pakistan on Saturday and kidnapped around 100 men, Pakistani government officials said.

headline.sub: "I'm not afraid to die for freedom" -- pro-Russia activist in Ukraine
headline.main: "I'm not afraid to die for freedom" -- pro-Russia activist in Ukraine

docs.snippet: Armed pro-Russian protesters build a barricade around seized police station in the eastern-Ukrainian city of Slaviansk and call for a referendum to join Russia. Gavino Garay reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Armed pro-Russian protesters build a barricade around seized police station in the eastern-Ukrainian city of Slaviansk and call for a referendum to join Russia. Gavino Garay reports.

headline.print_headline: Cruz Says He's Optimistic About Turning US Around
headline.main: Cruz Says He's Optimistic About Turning US Around

docs.snippet: Ted Cruz says he's optimistic about the country's future....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ted Cruz says he's optimistic about the country's future.

headline.print_headline: Former U.S. Marine's Family Asks Iran to Reconsider Prison Term
headline.main: Former U.S. Marine's Family Asks Iran to Reconsider Prison Term

docs.snippet: The family of an Iranian-American former U.S. Marine held in Iran since 2011 called on Saturday for senior Iranian officials to review his conviction and 10-year prison sentence on charges of collaborating with the U.S. government and to free him....
docs.lead_paragraph: The family of an Iranian-American former U.S. Marine held in Iran since 2011 called on Saturday for senior Iranian officials to review his conviction and 10-year prison sentence on charges of collaborating with the U.S. government and to free him.

headline.print_headline: Christie Gets Extension in Lane Closures Lawsuit
headline.main: Christie Gets Extension in Lane Closures Lawsuit

docs.snippet: Gov. Chris Christie and other defendants will get more time to file their responses to two lawsuits related to the September lane closures at the George Washington Bridge that are central to a traffic jam scandal threatening the Republican governo...
docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Chris Christie and other defendants will get more time to file their responses to two lawsuits related to the September lane closures at the George Washington Bridge that are central to a traffic jam scandal threatening the Republican governor's political ambitions.
